title: Border, ca. 1830
creditline: Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, Pauline Cooper Noyes, and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds
description: Simulated drapery border with two different patterned fabrics alternating. One contains a central floral swag, the other contains all-over patterning.  Each has a fringe along the bottom edge. Printed in green and pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Block-printed on joined sheets. Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, Pauline Cooper Noyes, and General Acquisitions Endowment Funds. 2000-29-2-a/i.
